hero.title: Elegance you can see when you smile
hero.subtitle: Cutting-edge digital dentistry, where precision meets comfort and personalized care.

about.title: Dental care with design
about.blurb: Since 1999, we combine technology and quality so your smile looks and feels better.
about.paragraph: Comprehensive dental clinic with all specialties, located in Zapopan, Jalisco. We are a Diamond Invisalign clinic with an in-house lab to create precise, natural, and personalized digital smile designs.

services.title: Treatments
services.blurb: Orthodontics, rehabilitation, endodontics, pediatric dentistry, prosthodontics, periodontics.

implantes.title: Implants
implantes.desc: Fixed and aesthetic replacement of missing teeth.

limpieza.title: Dental cleaning
limpieza.desc: Professional prophylaxis to keep gums and teeth healthy.

coronas.title: Dental crowns
coronas.desc: Strong and natural restoration of damaged teeth.

maxilofacial.title: Maxillofacial surgery
maxilofacial.desc: Specialized surgical procedures with high precision.

endodoncia.title: Endodontics
endodoncia.desc: Root canal treatment to preserve natural teeth.

periodoncia.title: Periodontics
periodoncia.desc: Comprehensive care of gums and bone support.

guarda_oclusal.title: Occlusal guard
guarda_oclusal.desc: Protection against bruxism and overload relief.

puentes.title: Oral rehabilitation
puentes.desc: Fixed solutions to replace one or more teeth.

alineadores.title: Aligners
alineadores.desc: Removable and discreet orthodontics to align your smile.

brackets.title: Braces
brackets.desc: Fixed orthodontics for bite correction and alignment.

blanqueamientos.title: Whitening
blanqueamientos.desc: Safe and effective teeth shade lightening.

carillas.title: Veneers
carillas.desc: Aesthetic laminates for perfect shape and color.

selladores.title: Sealants
selladores.desc: Protection of pits and fissures against cavities.

extracciones.title: Extractions
extracciones.desc: Simple and wisdom-tooth extractions with a minimally invasive approach.

ortopedia.title: Orthopedics
ortopedia.desc: Guiding jaw growth in young patients.

armonizacion_facial.title: Facial harmonization
armonizacion_facial.desc: Aesthetic botox treatment to enhance and balance facial features.

diseno_sonrisa.title: Smile design
diseno_sonrisa.desc: Comprehensive aesthetic plan to achieve a harmonious, personalized smile.

implantes.subtitle: Fixed replacement with premium Swiss Straumann titanium or zirconium implant and natural-looking crown.
bullets: Guided placement for greater precision and comfort.
Estimated time: surgery 30–45 min; integration 3–6 months.

limpieza.subtitle: Professional prophylaxis to keep gums and teeth healthy.

coronas.subtitle: Strong and aesthetic restoration of damaged teeth.

resinas.subtitle: Conservative tooth-colored restorations.
bullets: Estimated price: $1,500–$2,500 MXN (adult, case-dependent), $1,000 (child) per tooth.

maxilofacial.subtitle: Specialized surgical procedures with high precision.
bullets: Personalized surgical plan and pain control.

endodoncia.subtitle: Root canal treatment to preserve natural teeth.
bullets: Disinfection, shaping, and sealing of the canal.

periodoncia.subtitle: Comprehensive care of gums and bone support.

guarda-oclusal.subtitle: Protection against bruxism and overload relief.
bullets: Estimated time: 2 visits of 20–30 min; delivery in 5–7 days.
Estimated price: $2,500 MXN (occlusal guard), $4,500 MXN (CEREC functional guard).

puentes.subtitle: Fixed solutions to replace one or more teeth.
bullets: Design and occlusion adjustment for stability.

alineadores.subtitle: Removable and discreet orthodontics to align your smile.
bullets: Estimated time: 6–18 months, check-ups every 6–8 weeks.

brackets.subtitle: Fixed orthodontics for bite correction and alignment.
bullets: Estimated price: $33,000–$52,000 MXN for the treatment.

blanqueamientos.subtitle: Safe and effective teeth tone lightening.

carillas.subtitle: Aesthetic laminates for perfect shape and color.
bullets: Ceramic or resin with minimal preparation (case-dependent).
Estimated time: 2–3 visits; 7–14 days lab work.
Estimated price: $6,000–$12,000 MXN per tooth (depending on material).

limpieza-ninos.subtitle: Friendly and educational pediatric prophylaxis.
bullets: Gentle cleaning, fluoride varnish, and hygiene guidance.

selladores.subtitle: Protection of pits and fissures against cavities.

extracciones.subtitle: Simple and wisdom tooth extractions with a minimally invasive approach.

ortopedia.subtitle: Guidance of maxillary and mandibular growth in young patients.
bullets: Personalized functional appliances and periodic check-ups.

armonizacion-facial.subtitle: Botulinum toxin and dermal fillers for natural facial balance.
bullets: Soft line reduction and subtle volume enhancement.
Estimated time: 20–40 min; results last 4–12 months.
Estimated price: $5,000 MXN per area (Bruxism Botox) / $2,800 (baby botox).

diseno-sonrisa.subtitle: Comprehensive aesthetic plan with digital mock-up and guided execution.
bullets: Clinical photography, proportion analysis, and preliminary tests.
Estimated time: 1–3 appointments for diagnosis and mock-up.
Estimated price: Study $5,000 MXN; final treatment depending on plan ($10,000–$60,000 MXN). Gingival recontouring from $5,000 MXN.

default.subtitle: Personalized care according to your diagnosis.
bullets: Estimated price: to be quoted after evaluation.

slide1.title: Orthodontics without braces
slide1.textRight: in the world for bracket-free orthodontic treatments starting at age 8.

slide2.title: 3D-guided treatment
slide2.textRight: with digital monitoring and personalized adjustments for your smile.

slide3.title: Transparent aligners
slide3.textRight: without drastic changes in hygiene or eating habits.

Yes, along with payment plans for selected treatments.
